Advensys Conseil is a part of Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A.


Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A. is a public limited holding company located in Luxembourg and has been operating there for more than 12 years.


Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A. holds different types of companies in different fields and countries.

Advensys Conseil has been operating since 2007. It started its activity from providing professional accounting service and quality guidance of the clients in operational processes, tax optimization.

Nowadays we provide also business coaching and trainings that help the clients to scale up their business, get more clearance and reach bigger aims.
Groupe Advensys takes active part in Luxembourg Trade and Economic Missions to other countries (EU, East, Middle-East countries)

Advensys Conseil is an accounting firm, company and fund formation and tax optimisation agency.

We help our clients in an alternative fund incorporation, investments in real estate, company formation, accounting service, and tax optimization (structuring).

Advensys Conseil also gives service in consulting, business coaching and operational implementation of the steps to open your business in Luxembourg, enter European market using assets offered in Luxembourg, scale up your business.

Irfan Abdul,

CEO and Founder of the Groupe Advensys Luxembourg S.A.

Advensys Conseil is your reliable and expert partner in opening business, operational support (accounting, taxes etc) and in personal and corporative growing

Advensys Conseil has been authorized to label its specific products and services with "Made in Luxembourg" quality mark.
"Made in Luxembourg" displays with pride the expertise and its origin.

Several times per year Advensys Conseil organizes free Seminars, meetings with the experts for private people and corporative companies on different topics (Tax optimization, Investment Opportunities, Company incorporation, Scaling up your business etc).

The aim of such meetings for us is to help people to find better solutions for their businesses, life, to help them to promote and grow here in Luxembourg.
